body:
If u have any complaints against my comments u can ignore it but if u think it's good then pls .....there r people who like ntr but pls don't go too far to like encourage people to make mother son ntr comic because comic,movies and many other thing encourage things in reality .

THANK YOU

I PRAY GOD NO ONE FACE THIS THING IN REAL LIFE

are people in real life who get mostly mother Fu..ING ideas about fucking someone else mom from these things and if some of u think man if there is someone who think of fucking someone else mom then that person is either a person with mental condition or a complete psycho but for me he is a (beep beep beeeeeeeep, think any slang and bad words u can find in your dictionary to add there) and there r also some people who will say ok why u only seeing from son's perspective see from mother's too, doesn't she have her own desire ..of course follow ur desire but not like fucking hurting some one and that too your own blood and flesh.                   

There is more I want too say but.. I want too stop. THE WORLD IS REALLY FUCKING TURNING INTO WRONG DIRECTION

Listen all of u ...let me tell u something, a mother for a child specially for a boy is something that no one can explain. The love ,bond and everything is different from every love in the world and the warmness u can get from a mother cannot be obtained from anywhere..nowhere absolutely nowhere.
I know bullying is wrong but that doesn't mean that the victim will fuck the Bully's mom, if u want something against the bully then use violence or other methods or get stronger yourself . Do not bring a mother who has nothing to do for your revenge against the bully. bully also needs a mother and the one who gets bullied also need a mother. Mother is being in the universe that no one can compare to and if u take someone's mother away specially a boy then u have done the worst thing anyone can imagine. I know people will criticize me for being all drama queen since it's not real ,just enjoy the comic ,don't compare to yourself or just take it as an another hentai comic but there ..CONTINUE...
Check out URE-053 for the live-action adaptation of this h-manga.

So basically the husband ignores his wife for his peaceful days and admits that she doesn't turn him on anymore, son is too spoiled and bullying someone for being weak is just disgusting. Honestly, if I got to marry a woman like her we'd be doing it anytime we want to and give our kid the belt if he ever feels like talking back to us or says/we witness him bullying others. I don't like NTR but this one, those 2 deserved it.
I don't feel bad about the son. He was an asshole bully anyways. He deserved to be NTR'ed

In real life child neglect of any kind is disgusting but this isn’t real life. NTR like this are so fucked up but that’s why I love them. I love seeing an innocent mom, wife or girlfriend being degraded in the worst ways.

Is it just me or does this artist only do one kinda story arc. Like I get it's ntr and there's not a whole lot you can do with it, but it's the same monster of the week type shit that's really repetitive. I get that it's an over arcing story that's like 3 or 4 volumes long but it seems you can just favorite one based on character design and you're set the others don't matter. Is it just me or does anyone else feel robbed this artist is really good at ntr it just seems they don't care enough to mix it up a bit. I feel if this artist actually tried again this shit would be god tier but until then it's just lacking something.
Yuiichi deserves that
Beatiful. A fucking mater piece!
Triggered virgins alert

The story is too long and repetitive. It could have been reduced of something like 150 pages. Furthemore I think the mother should have been harsher with his son: even in the last part she still seems to care about him. I wanted her to yell him to go back home and stay the loser that he was. Also a final page about his new sad life would have been appreciated, as also said milkili. I give it a 4/10 because I've really disliked it and even more because it took like 40 minutes to completely read it. If you haven't read it yet, don't.

I think the only thing I disliked about this was what a lot of people didn't like; the other two kids that were invited in. I'm glad they didn't get to touch his actual mother, though. It would have been one of the best NTR doujins ever if those brats didn't show up. In my head, that's the last time they got to play with her. Lol. 9/10
Hay this is the same as the last one! Wtf does this author just do one story arc and just change up names and character designs. I feel robbed and this is free.

Nice story, quite satisfying. I like the ending, especially when takashi reject yuichi. However, you shouldn't add add other kids inside and mention Kenta, just let him has his own harem. Luckily you didn't let the other stupid kids fuck his mother. Should just make Yuichi depressed and commit suicide (gosh i'm so bad) I just dont like Yuichi hahaha

Great Story!!! Serve you right you bully!!!

Of all the NTR of Hana Hook, this one was actually satisfying. I hate bullies. I really do so this was a nice revenge story, plus her family took her for granted. The only turn off was the mentioning of Kenta from the other story. This and the other full color revenge story by Hana Hook with the 2 moms the childhood friend and the teacher are my 2 favorites of Hana Hook. But the one with Kenta SERIOUSLY fucks me up every time.
What a great Story dude, very nice =D
Hana Hook, my #1 artist.

Even if this doujinshi is just fiction, it means something that thecharacter have some belieable reactions otherwise it is a joke not a sad story. The problem with this netorare (and many of them) is not that your main character are betrayed by his most important people (girlfriend, mother, dauther or wife), the problem is his lack of reaction. I know tha what i called problem it is something that represent netorare but i think it would be more enjoyable and with better stories if the main character react as someone normally do (with anger in most cases, violence or in some greater situation with a master plan for revenge, and i dont say that it has to be a hapy end or that he win in the end but at least that he tried).

can you change the plot, like Kimiko fuck takashi without yuichi now about it. and Kaori go to yuichi because she feel betrayed by takashi, and both off them living whit they own lover and get pregnant. PS :i like your draw
This pissed me off more than any netorare story ever has.
I always die laughing at these stories.
